EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Continuous Testing with Tosca CI - 2015.05.27.Email - Follow up - Atte
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Continuous Testing with Tosca CI webinar.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Continuous Testing with Tosca CI
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our webinar, Continuous Testing with Tosca CI! We hope you found the webinar informative and helpful.
Click here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-continuous-testing-with-tosca-testsuite> for a recording of this webinar, or visit our Resource page <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/> for more presentations.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Thanks, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Gernot Brandl Tosca CI Product Manager Tricentis
